comments.body: Can you open a separate issue to remove this flag? I think it's marked deprecated for a couple of releases now so we should be able to remove it. It would simplify a lot of the code.

do you mean `--pod` flag?
`--pod` flag was deprecated in July last year https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/888119a47cd and I think this should stay around until July next month. of course I am willing to open the issue to delete this flag in time

Yeah, I complained before, but now 1.15 is a good time to remove the flag. Open a separate PR doing this, with the release date planned sometime in June we're good to remove it. Ping me in the PR please :smile:
OK, I will open a new PR related to that :sweat_smile:
@soltysh I have open separate PR to remove this flag.
